title: 3D World 109.
description:
Welcome to 3D World's latest CD, packed with software, assets and training to help you develop your CG skills. Leading this issue's line-up is Caligari's trueSpace 7.6, released for the first time as free software. 3D World is the first magazine to offer the complete software on CD.
This issue's tutorials pursue a vehicle theme, with masterclasses on working with cars, planes and trains. The disc offers tutorial files for our trueSpace, Blender and XSI tutorials; direct links to other tutorial files are provided in this disc's Tutorials section.
There's also a generous selection of vehicle models, representing the cream of assets available to buy online. Enjoy models from Digimation, 3d02, Turbo Squid, Arte-3D and 3D Revolution, along with textures from Texturama.
The Gnomon Workshop completes our vehicle theme with a 26-minute excerpt from Paul Schoeni's Vehicle Modeling for Production training video for Maya.
Enjoy the disc...
